title: Unemployment rate in South Korea 2024
summary: Overall Unemployment rate has increased over the Year.
Unemployment rate is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Unemployment rate, of value 4.0 was reached at Year 2019
Minimum Unemployment rate about 3.68 was reached at Year 2017
min_summary: In general Unemployment rate has rose over the Year.
Unemployment rate is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2019.
